metadata.title: CVE-2024-10979 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect control of environment variables in PostgreSQL PL/Perl allows anunprivileged database user to change sensitive process environmentvariables (e.g. PATH).  That often suffices to enable arbitrary codeexecution, even if the attacker lacks a database server operating systemuser.  Versions before PostgreSQL 17.1, 16.5, 15.9, 14.14, 13.17, and 12.21are affected.

criterions.comment: postgresql-16 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
